--- Pacifix / Lynxiz ---

Pacifix gasps, and quickly covers his head and going to one knee, 
bracing himself for the onslaught of metalic debri. Pieces of metal 
cover him, digging into his arms. He strugles to lift the shrapnel off. 
"Stupid punks..." he groans.

---------------------------------------------------------

Lynxiz flattens herself against the ground as Airbomber's 
shots pass by where she was formerly standing. She 
calms herself, coming out of her battle craze. Her claws 
retract, she draws herself into a crouch, and she pulls out 
her disk launcher firing immediately three disks set for 
impact (Cyberwolf's word, and it works well =) explosion. 
"You're not getting away that easily," she mutters.


On 1 Jun 2001, at 5:28, CYBERWOLF4 wrote:

> Brandings weapon is a flamethrower, I was thinking that the drastic
> change of temperature could ignite the warhead on the missle. I wasn't
> thinking that if a missle can withstand reentry temperatures it can
> survive her weapon. I guess it is a little hard to grasp. Next time
> I'll try to get it right without breaking the rules. Attack her again
> and I'll do better.
> 
> Arty staggers forward, the punch didn't do much damage but it served
> the purpose of knocking him off balance. He fired his cannons and
> another missle but his aim was forced upward causing him to blow a
> hole in the ceiling and sending the roof down on Arty and Pacifix.
